ygData.subject: Re: Fury
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron nimbly swerved out of the way, left, then right, the he ducked, and opened fire again with  his cannon, aiming for the arm Unitron was using to shoot.

Megatron nimbly swerved out of the way, left, then right, the he ducked,
and opened fire again with  his cannon, aiming for the arm Unitron was
using to shoot.
